description: This file implements a mock-first API client for a Wi-Fi mesh performance analyzer dashboard. It provides functions to fetch mock or real data about test runs, nodes, metrics, alerts, and status, and manages WebSocket connections for telemetry. It also includes internal mock data generation and update mechanisms.

methods.name: createApiClient
methods.description: Factory function that creates and returns an API client object with methods to interact with the backend or mock data.
